ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Pork Mince

instructions.step: Heat a large pan and fry the mince, onion and carrot for 2-3 minutes until brown, and the pork is cooked throughout with no pink meat.

Add the tomatoes. Then half fill the can with water and add to the pan with the tomato purée, oregano and stock cube. Simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cover and cook for a further 5 minutes. Season to taste.
Meanwhile, cook the tagliatelle in boiling water for 4 minutes. Drain well and stir into the Bolognese. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
